channel.title: SLOMISCAPE USERS: Iv Had Complaints, So Lets See Your Suggestions!
channel.description:
(I honestly have no idea which section I am supposed to post this in, but this is a question, so I posted it here!)
[size=15pt]AGAIN, THIS IS FOR SLOMISCAPE USERS! DONT POST UNLESS YOU ARE A PART OF MY SERVER!, OR IF YOU DONT HAVE SOMETHING VALUABLE TO SAY![/size]
I have had numerous complaints because my server has a lack of commands and functions.
I have started this thread so all those complainers can get my attention!
Post any suggestions you may have, but keep in mind the following points:
1. I WILL NOT add free item commands. I may add commands that require money to use, but that's a separate argument
2. Currently, Im having problems with -fedexer-'s global object adder; I get this error that says that it has already been stated, but it hasn't, so Im working on it :p.
3. Keep the just of point 1 in mind always. I have experienced this in other servers: servers that have free item commands are filled with rich people who used very little effort to get to where the are.
(Sorry if this thread screams "LOCK ME!", but I've had enough whining, so here it is...[br][size=1]Posted on: April 24, 2007, 05:32:00 PM[/size][hr]No one? Comon, theres more whinners than this :P

heh… ::chimera for admins gives them what i normally wwear (mah special outfit)

item.title: SLOMISCAPE USERS: Iv Had Complaints, So Lets See Your Suggestions!

item.description:
@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

Moderator’s don’t really veiw this section tbh. I’m only suggesting you move it there because I think you’ll get a better response… Also, don’t limit suggestions to people who play you’re server. Just say all suggestions are welcomed. :rolleyes:

Read full topic
